original_text: And immediately he got into the boat with his disciples and went to the district of Dalmanutha.
korean_text: 곧 제자들과 함께 배에 오르사 달마누다 지방으로 가시니라

sentences.original_text: And immediately he got into the boat with his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 즉시 그는 제자들과 함께 배에 탔고

sentences.original_text: and went to the district of Dalmanutha.
